Vlad: Agreed!

He starts heading towards the plateau and stops on it.

Vlad: I must admit, warrior, that you positively surprise me. We shall 
see if your prowesses are worth it too.

He stoops a bit to a combat stance.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> ????::
> 
> The femme thought a second "Both modes: beast and robot "replied the 
> femme "That would do that the trial be fast"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Vlad shows a big grin at this notion. He is not cocky enough to 
> feel 
> > he is absolutely going to be victorious, but he knew his own 
> stength.
> > 
> > Vlad: I feel honored that you challenge me to a Trial of 
> Possession. 
> > (He points to a small plateau 50 meters from there) We shall fight 
> > there, on that plateau. As it will be our circle of equals, the 
> first 
> > one to get out of the combat area loses. I suggest we fight in 
> robot 
> > mode, do you agree?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > ??????::
> > > 
> > > The femme bot laughed and said "First we're better without that 
> > idiot 
> > > and second..."her tone changed and said "I'm happy to be my own 
> boss 
> > > but I'm interested to join to Tripedocus... but I challenge you 
> for 
> > a 
> > > posession trial... the winner is the boss... Agree?"
